xc:entity.rdvocab:artisticAndOrTechnicalCredits: Compiled and produced by Richard Seidel ; production managed by Bryan Koniarz ; production and research coordinated by Carlos Kase ; original recordings produced by Bob Thiele.
xc:entity.rdvocab:performerNarratorAndOrPresenter: John Coltrane, tenor saxophone, with, variously: McCoy Tyner, Duke Elllington, piano ; Jimmy Garrison, Aaron Bell, Reggie Workman, bass ; Elvin Jones, Roy Haynes, Sam Woodyard, drums ; Johnny Hartman, vocals.
xc:entity.rdvocab:placeAndDateOfCapture: Recorded 1961-1963, by Rudy Van Gelder at Van Gelder Recording Studio, Englewood Cliffs, N.J.
